title: Leading underscore convention misuse for private helpers
description: Location: librazer/src/command.rs:10,16,31,45. Functions like _send_command, _set_perf_mode use underscore prefix which typically means unused. Remove underscores since they are already private.

title: Panic in From<&Packet> implementation
close_reason: Fixed: Changed unwrap() to expect() with descriptive message

title: Complex feature_list macro could be simplified
description: Location: librazer/src/feature.rs:7-38. The iter_features! macro is complex. Consider using strum::IntoEnumIterator on a single enum instead of generating separate structs.

title: Missing std::fs import for Linux build
description:
Location: librazer/src/device.rs:24

The Linux-specific code uses fs::read_to_string but std::fs is not imported, causing a compile error on Linux.

Add:
#[cfg(target_os = "linux")]
use std::fs;
close_reason: Invalid - std::fs is already imported at line 6 via use std::{fs, thread, time}. Code compiles successfully.

title: Hardcoded feature strings are error-prone
description: Location: librazer/src/descriptor.rs:17-24. Feature strings like 'battery-care', 'fan' must match kebab-case names exactly. Use constants or feature type directly instead.
close_reason: Fixed: Added feature name constants via paste macro. Descriptor.rs now uses feature::BATTERYCARE etc instead of strings.

title: FanMode missing common derives
description: Location: librazer/src/types.rs:31-35. FanMode is missing ValueEnum, Serialize, Deserialize unlike similar enums. This limits its usability in CLI and config.

title: Add documentation comments for public API
description: Public API has minimal doc comments. Add /// documentation for: all public functions in command.rs, the Device struct and its methods, the Packet structure and protocol.
close_reason: Added doc comments to: all public functions in command.rs, Device struct and methods, Packet struct and methods

title: enumerate() returns tuple - should use named struct
description:
Location: librazer/src/device.rs:95

pub fn enumerate() -> Result<(Vec<u16>, String)>

Return a named struct for clarity:
pub struct EnumerationResult {
    pub pids: Vec<u16>,
    pub model: String,
}

title: Duplicate zone iteration pattern
description: Location: librazer/src/command.rs:21-28,103-107. Inconsistent - sometimes uses raw u8, sometimes uses FanZone enum. Create a helper function for_each_zone.

title: unimplemented! for unknown subcommands should be unreachable!
description: Location: razer-cli/src/main.rs:310. Uses unimplemented!() but should be unreachable!() since clap validates subcommands, or return a proper error.

title: Inconsistent error handling pattern in get_perf_mode
description: Location: librazer/src/command.rs:56-77. The error handling is convoluted. Simplify the pattern.
close_reason: Fixed: Simplified error handling - removed redundant is_ok() check before ? operator, uses collect::<Result<Vec<_>>>()? pattern

title: Inconsistent subcommand matching in Fan handler
description: Location: razer-cli/src/main.rs:132-141. The nested match in Fan::handle is confusing compared to other handlers. Restructure for consistency.

title: API Design Improvements
description: API design and ergonomics improvements

title: razer-cli Improvements
description: CLI user experience and code improvements

title: Consider custom error types instead of anyhow everywhere
description: Everything uses anyhow::Result. Consider a custom error enum for better programmatic error handling with variants like DeviceNotFound, CommandNotSupported, InvalidResponse, HidError.

title: CommandStatus enum is incomplete
description:
Location: librazer/src/packet.rs:24-28

Issues:
- Missing #[repr(u8)] attribute
- Status 0x01 (Busy) is common in HID protocols but not handled
- Consider implementing TryFrom<u8> for better error messages

title: SUPPORTED array missing devices claimed in README
description: Location: librazer/src/descriptor.rs:12-38. README claims support for 2023 Blades (14,15,16) and 2024 Blades (14,16), but only 2 descriptors exist. Either add missing devices or update documentation.
close_reason: Fixed: Updated README to accurately list only the 2 devices in SUPPORTED array (Blade 14/16 2023)

title: Missing CRC calculation in Packet
description:
The crc field in Packet is always set to 0x00 and never computed before sending. If the device validates checksums, this could cause silent failures.

Location: librazer/src/packet.rs:44

```rust
crc: 0x00,  // Always zero - never computed
```

Either implement the checksum calculation or document why it's not needed.
close_reason: Implemented: Added calculate_crc() method and CRC is now computed in new() and set_args()

title: Early device detection breaks --help for auto mode
description: Location: razer-cli/src/main.rs:272-276. Device detection happens before argument parsing, so 'razer-cli auto --help' fails if no Razer device is connected. Defer device detection until after argument parsing.
close_reason: Fixed: Device detection is now deferred until after argument parsing, allowing --help to work without a device

title: Magic sleep values without explanation
description:
Location: librazer/src/device.rs:73,85

Sleep values are hardcoded without explanation:
thread::sleep(time::Duration::from_micros(1000));  // Why 1ms?
thread::sleep(time::Duration::from_micros(2000));  // Why 2ms?

Add constants with documentation explaining the timing requirements.

title: librazer Bug Fixes
description: Critical bug fixes for the librazer core library

title: Documentation & Testing
description: Documentation and test coverage improvements

title: Add unit tests for librazer
description: The codebase has no tests. At minimum, add unit tests for: Packet serialization/deserialization, TryFrom<u8> implementations, Feature name generation.
close_reason: Added 18 unit tests: 7 for TryFrom<u8> implementations, 7 for Packet serialization/deserialization, 4 for feature name generation

title: Repetitive TryFrom<u8> implementations
description: Location: librazer/src/types.rs:74-161. Seven nearly identical TryFrom implementations. Consider using a macro to reduce boilerplate.

title: get_args returns full 80-byte buffer instead of actual data
description:
The get_args method returns the entire 80-byte args buffer instead of just the valid data bytes indicated by data_size.

Location: librazer/src/packet.rs:53-55

Should return &self.args[..self.data_size as usize] to avoid callers processing garbage bytes.
close_reason: Fixed: get_args now returns &self.args[..self.data_size as usize]

title: Inconsistent derive macro ordering across enums
description: Location: librazer/src/types.rs:18,25,37,46,53. Derive macros are ordered differently across enums. Standardize the ordering.

title: Remove unused set_args method in Packet
description:
The set_args method in Packet is never called anywhere in the codebase.

Location: librazer/src/packet.rs:49-51

```rust
pub fn set_args(&mut self, args: &[u8]) {
    self.args[..args.len()].copy_from_slice(args)
}
```

Remove the dead code or mark with #[allow(dead_code)] if intended for future use.

title: Custom command lacks safety confirmation
description: Location: razer-cli/src/main.rs:86-116. The cmd command can send arbitrary bytes to the device with only a help text warning. Consider requiring a --force flag or printing a warning before execution.

title: Magic numbers for USB HID commands
description: Location: librazer/src/command.rs throughout. Commands like 0x0d02, 0x0d07, 0x0d87, etc are hardcoded. Define named constants like CMD_SET_PERF_MODE, CMD_GET_PERF_MODE, etc.
close_reason: Fixed: Added cmd module with named constants for all USB HID commands (SET_PERF_MODE, GET_PERF_MODE, etc). All magic numbers replaced.

title: Add more logging levels in librazer
description: The library only uses log::debug!. Add info! for significant operations and warn! for recoverable issues to give callers more visibility.

title: RPM validation missing error message
description: Location: librazer/src/command.rs:96. ensure!((2000..=5000).contains(&rpm)) has no error message. Add descriptive message.

title: clap::command!() missing metadata
description: Location: razer-cli/src/main.rs:285. Could add .author(), .about() for better help output.

title: Silent device selection logic - no logging for skipped devices
description:
Location: librazer/src/device.rs:54-65

When iterating through devices, no logging occurs when devices are skipped. This makes debugging difficult when the wrong device is selected.

Add debug logging for skipped devices.

title: librazer Code Quality
description: Code quality improvements for maintainability and robustness
